name: Breathedge
description: Experience the life of a simple guy with simple needs who tries to survive in the depths of the deep space. Explore, build, kick corpses, and poke everything with a chicken.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7, 8, 10 (x64) Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7, 8, 10 (x64) Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
